Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: A nice and cozy place to sit down and enjoy your coffee, good chill music and beautiful view. We enjoyed this place a lot.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Finding a clean coffee shop that you want to sit at is so difficult in Amsterdam. A friend took me here, and wow, what a great experience. I used to go to green house, but this will now be my regular place when visiting. Staff was very welcoming.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Bright,relaxed and friendly coffee shop. Great reggae music in the background and amazing lemon and ginger tea.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text:
First Coffeeshop that serves oatmilk
Very very nice indoor decoration, friendly staff #vegan

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Dankest of the Dank.

This place I stumbled onto when hunting for a WC, desperately needing a toilet. …

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Definitely a very chill, relaxed coffeeshop. Don’t come expecting the “usual” vibe/loud atmosphere. Perfect to slowly enjoy your weed, or try the excellent house made edibles. If your mom partakes, this is the place to take her! Awesome …

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Lovely guy runs this place and is always friendly. Lots of seating for a place this central, and some great cannabis-infused drinks!

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Organic, ecofriendly, beautiful coffee shop in the heart of Amsterdam right on the canal ! The weed is so flavoured, coming from outdoor and organic culture ! The staff is really helpful and friendly and the hot chocolate was delicious too ! Hilghly recommended !

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Lovely little coffeeshop, toastie was tasty, polite approachable staff, perfect to sit out in the autumn sunshine and just enjoy. Happy to have found this gem ♥️

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice place,cool location but horrible and disgusting iced coffee. No replacement for it. I got an espresso after it and wasn't any better. Again perfect location, nice spot but.....

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Prettiest coffeeshop in town. Nice selection of good weed, good drinks, relaxed atmosphere. The only downside is that they close at 7pm.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Fantastic staff and great atmosphere! Great spot for chilling and people watching activities.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: This is the sweetest little coffeeshop I've ever seen. Very nice and friendly staff and great atmosphere!

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Interesting experience. They style this place like a mad scientist/laboratory/pharmacy.  This was recommended by a guide on the tour of the city we took. …

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Love this place! Friendly staff (who remembered us!), excellent coffee, nice atmosphere, can't really fault it! It doesn't have an overly tourist vibe either, which adds to the experience.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Lovely atmosphere, amazing view. Less touristy Coffee Shop. Great coffee.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: It was my absolute favourite coffee shop in Amsterdam. If you love a chill relaxing environment to smoke in I highly recommend la tertulia, the staff and selection of Cannabis are wonderful. If you like a more club like atmosphere I don’t …

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: This shop is the nicest shop to stay in that I have visited so far in Amsterdam. There is a  naturally and brightly lit indoor terrace, with seats to sip tea, read, or chat with friends. There is outdoor seating as well. I can't review the bus since I didn't buy any here, but I plan to return to find out and relax and such a cool spot.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Our favourite coffee shop in Amsterdam and we've tried nearly all of them. Its beautiful outside right on one of the most beautiful canals in Amsterdam. Its also lovely to sit inside, full of plants and crystals. The staff is always so …

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: I like to smoke, but absolutely hate most coffee shops. This place still has the vibe of the coffee shops of my youth. I believe the fact that it's run by ladies is a big factor that sets this place apart from the other's.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Still the best! A personal favorite

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Prices are too expensive and it is not such a good place. The orange juice is the WORST I tried EVER. I felt so pressured by the staff to consume drinks, weed and food (ALL OF THEM, it was not enough to grab a drink or some weed). Definitely not coming back.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice place, it doesn't feel like a coffe shop but rather a very relaxing reading space. The products are good.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: As the other guy said, the bartender doesn't smile at all but she's so pleasant and sweet... like a film character. I'm in here right now and feel really great! Good orange juice and open space. Plants and lots of light, beautiful!

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great experience for beginners. An actual coffee place, not a dark one

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Heard it was a green and vegetalized coffee shop, might feel deceived on this matter but otherwise it's a pretty cool spot, they have of course different kind of weed and hash but most of all 3 différent sorts of Space cake from beginner to experienced ✌️✌️

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Friendly staff will make you feel like home. Board games, delicious family hot chocolate, and the owner has some lovely pictures of Brazil to share with you. Ask him!

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: KO! Went to this place as a group of four. Two of us had cakes, one had a waffle and the other just smoked. I don't know if it was because we did not eat a massive lunch before eating the cake/waffle or something like that; but three of us …

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best coffee shop in all of Amsterdam in my opinion. It's small but light & airy with plants in the entrance & large windows. You can play boardgames while enjoying a toasted sandwich. Only catch is that it closes early.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Situated on the corner of Prinsengracht and Oude Looiersstraat, La Tertulia is one of the city's original coffee shops. It takes its name from the Spanish word which translates as "The Salon". …

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: They ask you purchase smokes and drinks there; in other words, don't bring your own delights or use them there. There is a bathroom, and the vibe is cool. It seems like an awkward tourist spot but so do most coffeeshops.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: When extinction rebellion are exiled to Amsterdam like climate camp was in 2009...they have to come to this place for their meetings...vegan and vegetarians welcome and needed to smoke good weed. This place comes highly recommended if you are part of the movement of movements.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Light, airy and reasonably quiet coffeeshop. 10/10 would come here again as long as they let us play board games on weekends. Otherwise excellent freshly squeezed orange juice and service.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: So beautiful and unassuming, definitely the nicest coffeeshop I've been to in Amsterdam. Staff are all super friendly, smiley and relaxed, and the music is perfect and not too loud (always a big turnoff). They sell weed, pre-rolled's, and edibles, and freely explain everything. Wish I'd come across it sooner!

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best coffeeshop around town! I love the small but cosy cafe with good quality products. The cakes and drinks were excellent.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: A quiet little coffeeshop outside of the city center.  I've been twice over the last 7 years (2007 and 2010) and it was always a positive experience.  The floor level feels dense with plants and books, similar to a cozy den.  The upper …

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Really friendly, chilled out coffee shop. Cool for newbies or old hands

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Cozy, casual and happy. Right on the canal and near plenty of public transit, La Tertulia is a perfectly situated coffee shop playing great music with a small but well used layout with plenty of natural light. They offer Tosti sandwiches, …

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Me and my boyfriend arrived to drink a coffee and enjoy our time, sit and talk. And the guy was really rude and said that we need to buy a coffee and weed as weel, but we didn't want. So we fell very uncomfortable and we order a coffee and left. We tried to find a nice place but this one is not on the list anymore.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: A great spot for a smoke and a coffee. Really clean with few tables outside right on the edge of an Amsterdam canal. Good collection of weed and brownies.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great place. The staff is very kind and cool. Great place to sit and relax either alone or in group. Weed is; whatever, which is good enough for most. But you can bring your own.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Found this place on our last day in town and so happy about it. Bright but cozy with a lovely garden. The woman working there was gentle and kind. What a wonderful place to smoke a j

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: So much more chill, delicate and feminine compared to all the other coffeeshops which all seem to have a very broey/laddish vibe - not that that's a bad thing but it's nice to get somewhere thats a bit more tame and has a feminine aesthetic

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Friendly staff, decent priced goods. There is a lot of seating both indoors and outside. Great fresh squeezed orange juice. Overall good experience.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: I really love this coffeeshop, you don't have the typical coffeeshop vibe. Great relaxt atmosphere, lots of plants, and a very nice lady selling the great and often organic herbs to enjoy with a nice coffee and browny or to take away and space out somewhere else in Amsterdam.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Bio hemp coffeeshop, you have to buy weed or Home made Space Brownies to be able to sit and enjoy a drink. The place is cosy and much better that other crowded and dark coffeeshops. Positive vibes.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Lovely ambiance, if you love being surrounded by stones/crystals and positive energy! Tried the Jack Herer and LOVED it. You can also purchase some crystals & some jewlery too. Lots of seating ... definitely worth a visit :)

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: An original design and I loved the vibe inside. People either working or chilling with their SO's. Something different, that's for sure. If you're a woman and feel intimidated by coffeeshops, step in - you won't be here.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: the vegan space cake is very good

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very good place to chill and eat milkshake

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Lovely place and lovely staff/owners. Very chilled out and that's how I like my coffeeshop. Must see for the nature inspired decor.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: It is a really calm experience, the weed is strong and is a good mix, is not a place with loud music that can upset you. When i go back this place is on my list.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: The Smokers Guide has always been a fan of La Tertulia. A light and friendly canal-side shop, with a a quality menu. Not too touristy, a bit more relaxed with the crystal garden and split level design. Check out our Google+ page to learn more.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Weed is okay, atmosphere and people great! Closed early though and on mondays, but a great spot to relax with some tea and such nonetheless.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: I liked this place a lot. The woman behind the bar didn't smile at all, but she was very friendly. They have a verdamper vaporizer which is great.  I will be back next time I'm around.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Nice place, nice weed, nice people

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: I had a great time here, nice ambience and atmosphere. The stairs upstairs are a little steep but fine. Loved my time here :)

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: I just love this place. Great location and interesting decor. The two women owners are lovely and the goods on sale are second to none. Not to be missed!

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Very nice and cool place, quiet, spacy, bright and airy. A lot of space inside and on the terrace. Excellent and varied music selection.
Certainly one of the best place ...

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Really nice atmosphere, good organic weed. Selection of board games. One of my favourite coffeeshops

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Very friendly staff. Welcoming and taking the time. I would recommend for an easy going time.
Products are well priced and of good quality.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Amazing coffeeshop. Very nice staff, good food, great organic weed. The design fits very well.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: In my opinion this is the chillest coffeshop in A'dam. Soft atmosphere with plants and coloured art. Weed quality is normal

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Lovely coffeeshop, with organically sourced products which is a huge plus. Lovely staff and nice atmosphere, a new favourite!

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Chilled vibe and really friendly service. Way better atmosphere than other coffeeshops in Centraal

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: I think this is one of the best coffeeshops in Amsterdam and I have been in most of them. Their Kali brand is great!

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: My 18 year old daughter bought a brownie here. The second hand smoke did not agree with me, though., so she got it to go.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: The best in A'dam! Go! Just great. different than other coffeeshops. lots of light. quite. super kind owner.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Bocca coffe is amazing! The weed assortment is just fantastic and their customer service is admirable

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text:
Great quiet and cozy in a perfect location.
IT'S NOT the place to go with drunk friends and be loud.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Friendly and cheap the owners are 2 girls vey nice service :))) atomsphere relaxing :))

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best edibles in town!!! Cozy,a lot of space and the music is really good!!

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Best coffeeshop I've been to in Amsterdam. Chill, good music, good service. Flew out high as a kite. 😂

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Not the best smokes but great environment to sit down chill and play a game of Dutch scrabble.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: I love this sweet little coffee shop. Lovely balcony seating and great toasties.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very nice owners, lovely place. We had good time.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Great friendly atmosphere. Shop keeper great and informative. Will be back :)

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Very cute place with nice people

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text:

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Exactly what we needed when we needed

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: Your coffeeshop looks really nice from the outside. Sadly we couldn't come in because you were closed

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: A very lively, bright and refreshing coffee shop. Must visit them when in Amsterdam

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
Review Text: A quiet and really simple place. Really good weed. I advise amnesia.

Name: La Tertulia Coffeeshop
